channel.title: 17-18-19 December 2016 Geek Market @ Spektrum Berlin
channel.description:
http://spektrumberlin.de/open-calls/detail/open-call-geek-market-2.html
Open call for makers, maybe something for you @johannes?
Was there last year, it's not really big but nice and cozy and the location has a really good reputation for pushing underground experimental art forms.
